title: West Side Story
description: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

title: Judgment at Nuremberg
description: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazi judges for war crimes.

title: The Hustler
description: An up-and-coming pool player plays a high-stakes game against a longtime champion but gets too cocky and loses everything.

title: Yojimbo
description: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
description: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

title: The Innocents
description: A young governess for two children becomes convinced that the house and grounds are haunted.

title: Through a Glass Darkly
description: While vacationing on a remote island, a schizophrenic woman's condition deteriorates as she believes she is being visited by God.

title: A Raisin in the Sun
description: A substantial insurance payment could mean either financial salvation or personal ruin for a poor black family.

title: Divorce Italian Style
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay - Written Directly for the Screen
description: A married baron falls in love with his cousin and vows to wed her, but with divorce illegal he must hatch a plot to get rid of his wife.

title: La Notte
description: A day in the life of an unfaithful married couple and their failing relationship in Milan.

title: Lola
description: A bored young man meets a childhood friend and falls in love with her, but her heart belongs to someone who left her years ago.

title: Victim
description: A barrister discovers that a blackmailer is targeting homosexuals, and he decides to risk his career to bring the gang to justice.

title: The Children's Hour
description: A malicious student at an all-girls school accuses two teachers of having a lesbian affair, destroying their lives.

title: Splendor in the Grass
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay - Written Directly for the Screen
description: A fragile Kansas girl's love for a handsome classmate is tested by his father's disapproval and her own mental instability.

title: One, Two, Three
description: A Coca-Cola executive in West Berlin is given the task of taking care of his boss' socialite daughter, who secretly marries a fierce communist.

title: One-Eyed Jacks
description: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured, but Rio escapes five years later and hunts down Dad for revenge.

title: The Misfits
description: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who is struggling to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle in early-sixties Nevada.

title: 101 Dalmatians

director.name: Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske & Wolfgang Reitherman

description: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella de Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

title: The Guns of Navarone
description: A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.

title: El Cid
description: The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz (a.k.a. El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.

title: Pocketful of Miracles
description: A gangster and his guys help an old apple seller pass as a wealthy society matron when her daughter comes to visit.

title: The Parent Trap
description: Teenage twin sisters swap places and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.

title: King of Kings
description: A dramatization of the life of Jesus of Nazareth from his birth and ministry to his crucifixion and resurrection.

title: The Pit and the Pendulum
description: In the sixteenth century, Francis Barnard travels to Spain to clarify the circumstances of his sister's death after she married the son of a cruel inquisitor.

title: The Human Condition III: A Soldier's Prayer
description: The final part of the trilogy follows Kaji, a Japanese soldier, as he leads his remaining men through enemy lines in Manchuria during the final days of WWII.

title: A Woman Is a Woman
description: A stripper wants a baby, but her boyfriend refuses, so she turns to his best friend to impregnate her.

title: Last Year at Marienbad
description: In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes convinced that he met a woman there the year before and they arranged to meet again.

title: Blast of Silence
description: A hitman returns to New York City during Christmas week for a job, but old memories and new complications arise.

title: Mother Joan of the Angels
description: A priest is sent to a convent where the nuns are allegedly possessed by demons.

title: Accattone
description: A pimp in Rome tries to change his life after falling in love with a young woman.

title: Plácido
description: In a small Spanish town, a group of wealthy ladies decide to celebrate Christmas Eve with a "Seat a Poor Man at Your Table" dinner.

title: Whistle Down the Wind
description: Three children discover a fugitive hiding in their barn and believe him to be Jesus Christ.

title: Blue Hawaii
description: After arriving back in Hawaii from the Army, Chad Gates defies his parents' wishes for him to work at the family business and instead goes to work as a tour guide.

title: The Absent-Minded Professor
description: A college professor invents an anti-gravity substance which a corrupt businessman wants for himself.

title: Leon Morin, Priest
description: In a French town during the Occupation, a young widow finds herself falling in love with a priest.

title: A Taste of Honey
description: A pregnant teenager, abandoned by her mother, is befriended by a gay student.

title: Mysterious Island
description: During the Civil War, a group of Union soldiers and two Confederates escape in a balloon and land on a strange Pacific island.

title: The Comancheros
description: Texas Ranger Jake Cutter arrests gambler Paul Regret, but soon finds himself teaming up with his prisoner in an undercover effort to defeat a band of renegade arms merchants and thieves known as The Comancheros.

title: Flower Drum Song
description: A young woman travels from China to America for an arranged marriage, only to discover her intended husband is in love with a nightclub dancer.

title: Babes in Toyland
description: Tom Piper and Mary Contrary prepare for their wedding, but the evil Barnaby wants Mary for himself and kidnaps Tom.

title: Underworld U.S.A.
description: A young man sets out to exact revenge on the four mobsters who beat his father to death.

title: Town Without Pity
description: Four American soldiers are accused of raping a German girl, and a major is assigned to defend them, leading to a trial that exposes deep prejudices.

title: Summer and Smoke
description: A repressed spinster falls in love with a hedonistic doctor in Mississippi during the early 20th century.

title: The Young Savages
description: A district attorney investigates the murder of a blind Puerto Rican boy by a gang of Italian-American teenagers.

title: Return to Peyton Place
description: Allison MacKenzie writes a tell-all book about her hometown, Peyton Place, causing scandal and uproar among the residents.

title: Come September
description: A wealthy businessman arrives early for his annual Italian vacation to find his villa has been turned into a hotel by his enterprising major-domo.

title: Barabbas
description: The story of the thief Barabbas, who was spared from crucifixion when Pontius Pilate allowed the crowd to release him instead of Jesus.

title: The Ladies Man
description: After his girlfriend dumps him, Herbert H. Heebert swears off romance and takes a job at a boarding house for aspiring actresses.

title: Homicidal
description: A young woman with a mysterious past arrives in a small town, and soon after, a series of gruesome murders begin to occur.

title: Hercules in the Haunted World
description: Hercules must journey to the underworld to retrieve a magic stone that will free his love from a spell.

title: Mothra
description: Shipwreck survivors are found on Beiru Island, a site previously used for atomic tests. The interior is inhabited by natives who worship the god Mothra, a giant moth.

title: The Exiles
description: A group of Native Americans who have left the reservation to live in the Bunker Hill district of Los Angeles struggle to make ends meet.

title: Something Wild
description: A young student's life is shattered after she is raped, leading her to hide away from society until a mechanic offers her shelter.

title: The Errand Boy
description: Paramutual Pictures hires a blundering paperhanger to be a spy and report on studio inefficiency.
